name: HoloLife
description:
Meet your favorite Hololive members re-imagined!

You're starting your life as a student at Asacoco University, a well renown school for it's legendary idol program. There you see some familiar faces and get a look at the lives of your favorite Hololive members! Discover what goes on behind the scenes in this world of fantastical idols in this free fan-made visual novel complete with original art and music from talented shrimps around the world!

Currently Released:

Gaming club Chapters 1 & 2 - feat Korone, Okayu, Fubuki, Mio, and you!

Coco Special Chapter! - feat Coco

This game is currently in development, more content will be available for the final release. Please be patient!

Want to help?

Join our development discord!

We also have a general hololive/anime fan discord where all this started!

This is a fan project. All character copyrights belong to Cover Corp. The story written is not official in any way nor does it represent the intentions of Cover Corp or any of the talents. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental. We are a group of dedicated fans doing this out of love for the group so pls don't sue :D
